definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

pinyin: yuan2 zhu1 xing2 li2 zi3 jiao1 huan4 ji4

sentences.english: The solubility increase is not obvious with nonionic surfactants added.
sentences.chinese: 它與非離子表面活性劑復配增溶效果不明顯。

sentences.english: The spectrometer has been equipped with an axial plasma torch and a rotary spray chamber.
sentences.chinese: 光譜儀配有端視等離子體炬和旋流霧室進樣裝置。

sentences.english: The most effective air—ion producer is worked by statistic effluvium.
sentences.chinese: 最有效的離子發生器是無聲放電式的。

sentences.english: A part of polymeric deposit can be reconverted into methane and acetylene by hydrogen plasma.
sentences.chinese: 積炭能夠與氫氣等離子體反應轉化成甲烷和乙炔。

sentences.english: The domestic caustic soda production techniques by diaphragm method and ion-exchange membrane method at present are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了當前國內隔膜法和離子膜法燒鹼的生產技術。

sentences.english: A shower of plasma followed by a shower of glass from exploding light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 電燈泡爆炸後，與玻璃碎渣一同四濺的是等離子體。

sentences.english: Hydrotalcite-like compounds are a sort of anionic clays with double-layer structure.
sentences.chinese: 水滑石類化合物是一種具有層狀結構的陰離子粘土。

sentences.english: Objective To study the microbicidal effect of hyperoxidation ion water.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究強氧化離子水對微生物的殺滅效果。

sentences.english: The ions in TATB are with positive and negative charges in turns.
sentences.chinese: 整個TATB分子上面離子的淨電荷是正負相間的。

sentences.english: A heavy-ion time-of-flight spectrometer has been constructed and operated successfully in our experiments.
sentences.chinese: 我們成功地研製了一臺重離子飛行時間譜儀。

sentences.english: Finally, the optimal electron collision frequency of the non-magnetized plasma is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後，給出了非磁化等離子體的最佳碰撞頻率。

sentences.english: The asymmetry was caused by induced magnetic anisotropy aroused by Ion Beam Mixing in magnetic field.
sentences.chinese: 這與在磁場下離子束混合造成的感生磁各向異性有關。

sentences.english: The solubility of the resin depends on the critical balance of positively and negatively charged ions.
sentences.chinese: 樹脂的溶解性取決於陰，陽離子的電平衡。

sentences.english: Huiquan Li, Jinshu Wang. Recycling and Reuse of Ionic Liquid in Homogeneous Cellulose Acetylation.
sentences.chinese: 蔗渣纖維素在離子液體中的溶解與再生。

sentences.english: The mechanism and accomplishment method of PET bottle treated with plasma are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹等離子體處理聚酯瓶的機理及處理的方法。

sentences.english: Strange meson production in heavy ion collisions has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 我們研究了重離子碰撞中的奇異介子產生。
